content: *take the traditional granny square to new heights and widths made of a single giant granny square this is a fast and easy project lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20109 *ccusa-grandgrannysquareafghan pdf* skill level easy level 2 chunky usa article #420 *discontinued* *super bulky weight yarn can be substituted * 4 colors a fisherman 930 yards b skyscraper grey 310 yards c amish black 310 yards d crimson 465 yards crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm gauge 3 double_crochet us groups + 5 row = 4 inches 10 cm in pattern also at https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-gr-granny-square-afghan-3
